name: Jellyfin Xtream (Flat View)
description: Stream Live IPTV, Video On-Demand, and Series from an Xtream-compatible server with flat view, caching, and enhanced metadata.
overview: A fork with flat view browsing, eager caching, TVDb/TMDB artwork, and better error handling.

versions.changelog: Fix VOD duplicate movies bug - VodChannel was using inconsistent ID format causing every movie to appear twice
Add VOD/Movies caching with TMDB artwork support

name: Xtream Library
description: Sync Xtream VOD and Series content to native Jellyfin libraries via STRM files for universal client compatibility.
overview: Creates STRM files from Xtream content for native library integration - works with all clients including Swiftfin.

versions.changelog: Initial release - Movies/VOD sync, Series sync with Season/Episode structure, automatic library scan, orphan cleanup
